definitions.definition: One who engages in a raid ; a plunderer .
A person who takes or attempts to take control of a firm against the will of current management by purchasing a controlling interest of stock and acquiring proxies .
A special forces operative; a commando .
A warship which is light, maneuverable , and fast-moving.
A warplane on an air raid .
A law enforcement official who conducts a raid on a building in search for illicit goods.
A person who uncovers evidence of improper behavior within governmental or private organizations.

main_definition: One who engages in a raid ; a plunderer .
secondary_definitions: ( business ) A person who takes or attempts to take control of a firm against the will of current management by purchasing a controlling interest of stock and acquiring proxies .
( military ) A special forces operative; a commando .
( military , naval ) A warship which is light, maneuverable , and fast-moving.
A warplane on an air raid .
A law enforcement official who conducts a raid on a building in search for illicit goods.
( informal ) A person who uncovers evidence of improper behavior within governmental or private organizations.
